title: Hong Kong Consumer Spending
description: Consumer Spending in Hong Kong decreased to 458486 HKD Million in the third quarter of 2022 from 469734 HKD Million in the second quarter of 2022. Consumer Spending in Hong Kong averaged 242704.12 HKD Million from 1973 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 516460 HKD Million in the fourth quarter of 2018 and a record low of 42916 HKD Million in the first quarter of 1974. This page provides - Hong Kong Consumer Spending - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Census and Statistics Department, Hong Kong
